text: Flicka is a 2006 American family adventure drama movie loosely based on the 1941 children's novel My Friend Flicka by Mary O'Hara. The movie is directed by Michael Mayer and written by Mark Rosenthal and Lawrence Konner. The novel had previously been made into a movie by 20th Century Fox in 1943, and served as the inspiration for My Friend Flicka, a 39-episode TV series in 1956â€“1957. title: Flicka
